article_title: Former tenants find big dreams dashed
article_text:
Hastings, NE (68901)

Today

Variable clouds with scattered thunderstorms. A few storms may be severe. High 69F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%..

Tonight

Thunderstorms likely. A few storms may be severe. Low around 55F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , phoenix centre, old middle school, marvin butch hughes, linda kube, my sister's closet, ty hoffman, nautlius gym, lisa hiatt, reclamation, robee bigelow, the quilter's loft
article_metadata.author: Will Vraspir

og.description: Some former tenants at the old Hastings Middle School feel they have been misled and swindled by the former owner of the property.
